subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: James L. Dolan, the owner of the Knicks, and Mikhail D. Prokhorov, the owner of the Nets, share a city and an approach that has saddled them with high payrolls for weak teams.
snippet: James L. Dolan, the owner of the Knicks, and Mikhail D. Prokhorov, the owner of the Nets, share a city and an approach that has saddled them with high payrolls for weak teams.
